title: Report a Health Code Violation
description: A citizen wants to file a complaint about unsanitary conditions at a local restaurant.

tasks.description: Gather details of the complaint, including the restaurant name, address, and the specific nature of the violation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately documents the citizen's complaint.

tasks.description: Log the complaint in the health department's case management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new complaint case.

tasks.description: Inform the citizen that the complaint has been received and will be assigned to a health inspector for follow-up.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides assurance that the complaint will be investigated.
